mdes.slick.sui.event
Class KeyAdapter

java.lang.Object
  mdes.slick.sui.event.KeyAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, KeyListener, Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextArea.AreaKeyListener, TextComponent.TextKeyListener, TextField.FieldKeyListener
public class KeyAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyListener

A convenience class for SuiKeyListeners which receives key events. Implementation of these methods are optional.

Since:
b.0.2
